summary.title: Personal Profile
summary.text: I'm a versatile software developer, trainer and storyteller. I recently completed a remote Full-Stack Development Diploma with Code Institute (Dublin). I have extensive experience in localization, translation, and technical writing, with a proven ability to handle complex challenges in varied specialist environments. I'm eager to resume my career by joining an innovative and capable development team tasked with creating an innovative product.
